data.text: @jesswesterman19 @freeyoursoulfit I am one of the ‘they’ who puts together information on that my dude. Kelly is a frontline worker in a nursing home. @‘ing the wrong folks.
@jesswesterman19 @freeyoursoulfit Would not have symptoms or ailments from it, but yes around the general public largely unvaxxed wear a mask.

@jesswesterman19 @freeyoursoulfit Those recommendations are not for being around others already vaccinated. Getting the vax it’s not known if you can carry covid and spread to others (non vax’d) and get them sick. But 2 fully vaccinated people are protected. If either group somehow got covid post vax they
@jesswesterman19 @SaSquats Certainly me interacting with my parents is not going to potentially spread COVID in the community considering they have been basically on lockdown since this all started

@jesswesterman19 @SaSquats I am the first person to keep 6 feet distance and continue to wear a mask, especially among my high risk parents, but at this point we are hopeful that, if I semi quarantine beforehand, I can spend some time around them maskless.

@jesswesterman19 @SaSquats Okay so I didnt want to get into this lol but not only are we vaccinated, I’m recently COVID recovered and my parents don’t go anywhere and I haven’t stepped foot in their house in >1 year and the one thing I am dying to do is eat dinner with them sit on their couch
@jesswesterman19 @freeyoursoulfit No need to perpetuate false information
@jesswesterman19 @freeyoursoulfit Not needed between two fully vaccinated people ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
